resources.string:
1. Open on your browser
chrome://inspect to start inspecting requests. \n\n 2. Click Next button to do the request:
1. Basic Sample: shows basic features \n\n 2. Stetho Sample: shows how to setup your setup interceptor with OkHttp (you should setup stetho based on your own project dependencies)
Slide from right edge of the screen to left to see the debug artist drawer.
